name: machine-room-east
description: Now you're definitely in a sensitive area. Racks of servers hum away. Fortunately most of them are just for testing, we use the cloud you know!

inventory.name: server
inventory.detailedDescription:
The servers look like they can be accessed via a console nearby.
One of the servers has a bay to install extra hard drives into.

missions.name: installdisk
missions.displayName: install a hard disk in the machine room server

reward.message:
You slot the disk into the server hard drive bay. It clicks permanently into place and spins up.
You hear a small 'beep' from nearby. Let's find out what was on that disk.

attributes.detailedDescription:
It's a really old-style green screen (or at least it's made to look like one).
It's continuously paging through data from somewhere.

You scan the contents as they run past and pick up the odd mangled word and phrase.
'...I 5_!£_ 6!£¬_$@th call for¬@£^ the C~#t of !£* R£@ G~#@'... ...'book of summ!£*_+g... ...sacri+}[@: souls open _^* gate'... ...'eternal ¬~@#'...

There's much more to this place than just a software company. If only you'd read the small print on your employment contract.
Let's assume not everyone here is a willing participant in this - and from what you can gather here, the consequences of whatever's going on are unlikely to be localised to just this building.

inventory.name: console
inventory.detailedDescription: It's pretty old and tatty. There's no sign of life in it at the moment.
